message: I propose a division where I receive 75$ and you receive 25$. This offers a balanced distribution considering the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.

I propose a 60/40 split in my favor, recognizing the decreasing value of money for both of us. This offers a more equitable distribution while still accounting for the inflation we're facing. Let's work together to maximize our gains before the value of the money dwindles further.
